concept.definition: Alternative form of title or abstract is a different language.
Alternative form of title or abstract is a different language, language element codes the language into which it was translated by machine.
Alternative form of title or abstract  in two or more Medline entries.
concept.display: Different text in additional Medline entry

concept.definition: Alternative form of title or abstract in an earlier version such as epub ahead of print.
concept.display: Different text in an earlier version

description: Used to express the reason and specific aspect for the variant title, such as language and specific language.
name: AlternativeTitleType

text.div:
This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/alternative-title-type defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
language Different language Alternative form of title or abstract is a different language.
autotranslated Different language derived from autotranslation Alternative form of title or abstract is a different language, language element codes the language into which it was translated by machine.
duplicatePmid Different text in additional Medline entry Alternative form of title or abstract in two or more Medline entries.
earlierTitle Different text in an earlier version Alternative form of title or abstract in an earlier version such as epub ahead of print.
subtitle Subtitle Subtitle or Secondary title.

title: AlternativeTitleType
